mainText: I'm a small business owner, this business, my business is my life, doesn't matter if is computers or a small restaurant, a dream is a dream, a man without a dream is an empty shell, i respect you steve, respect what you did for all of us, God speed! i'm sure you are able to dream again in a different place or maybe doing it all over again, i wish that's what Heaven is or should be. See you again
author: Andrea
